entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow or rain. High plus 5.
